scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin news.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/news.html && usemin preventionmethod.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/preventionmethod.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
